title: HAX Accelerator
description: The Seed Program combines a $250,000 investment, 180 days of collaboration, and global founder community for early stage founders building hard tech startups. Founders join HAX Ventures in **San Francisco, Shenzhen, and Tokyo** to collaborate with an **in-house team of engineers, designers and entrepreneurs.** Startups get access to experts, investors, manufacturers and supply chains to thrive as an early stage hard tech startup. If you unclude UC Berkeley in the referral section of the application, you will jump to the top of the line for first review. Apply by April 30.
